DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , Non-comparative , Multi-center clinical trial evaluate safety efficacy STARflo Glaucoma Implant patient refractory open angle glaucoma .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multicenter clinical trial ass efficacy safety STARflo™ Glaucoma Implant . Patients enter study provide write informed consent . Patients screen confirm eligible study participation . When eligibility establish use in/exclusion criterion , surgery schedule . Pre post-surgery , patient evaluate scheduled interval ( 1 day , 1 week , 1 month , 3 month , 6 month , 12 month ) total duration 12 month follow surgery .
DOC.criteria: Main Diagnosis refractory open angle glaucoma Documented 21 mmHg < IOP ≤ 40 mmHg , medication
